Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Port Authority police officer Frederick G. Maley memorial highway"
Summary: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Port Authority police officer Frederick G. Maley memorial highway" in the hamlet of North Bellmore, town of Hempstead, county of Nassau.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Port Authority police officer Frederick G. Maley memorial highway"
